channel.title: New car for the 0-3 range
channel.description:
Today I went to the Abilities expo in Dallas. Was thrilled to see that one of the major manufacturers of chairs have come up with a prototype for the 0-3 child. This is still awaiting FDA approval, but Cole Gallaway and Sam Logan, I bet you can tell us alot more about the features! It will be made by Permobil- it is currently call the Explorer Mini, and they are still pricing it, but it sounds a little steep to me. I did want to share this though, for those of us who have been making joystick driven cars - the rep affirmed that what ever research they had done supported the use of a joystick over a single switch. I apologize for the pictures- they do wonky things when I try to upload them.....
![permobile|640x480](upload://83wvlmR20DHa0s4VNOYq5IdZsqu.jpeg) ![permobile1|375x500](upload://cDlY1yJrOdcXpXl7o7oyEynxswm.jpeg)
